name: Swagman XTC 4-Bike 2" Receiver Hitch Rack
description: A popular four bike hitch mount carrier, now with more finish-friendly grip arms and better wheel straps.Push button ratcheting arms.Easily adjusts to all frame sizes.Folds up for easy storage when not in use.Capacity: 4 bikes (35 lbs max each).Centre arm folds down for rear access to your vehicle.Fits fat bikes (fat tire trays sold separately).Locking 5/8 inch hitch pin and 2.6m cable included.NOTE: this rack may obscure your rear licence plate.
